PLACEHOLDER_FAQ_TITLE: Frequently Asked Questions About Our Computer Mouse Marketplace
ACCORDION_QUESTION_1: How do I choose the right mouse for me?
ACCORDION_ANSWER_1: Consider factors like your hand size, preferred grip style, intended use (gaming, office work, graphic design), and desired features such as wireless connectivity or programmable buttons. Our detailed product descriptions and user reviews can help you make an informed decision.
ACCORDION_QUESTION_2: What's your return policy for mice?
ACCORDION_ANSWER_2: We offer a 30-day return policy for all mice purchased through our marketplace. If you're unsatisfied with your purchase for any reason, you can return it for a full refund or exchange, provided the mouse is in its original condition with all accessories.
ACCORDION_QUESTION_3: Do you offer wireless and wired mice?
ACCORDION_ANSWER_3: Yes, our marketplace features a wide variety of both wireless and wired mice. Wireless mice offer greater flexibility and a cleaner desk setup, while wired mice typically provide a more responsive connection and don't require battery changes or charging.
ACCORDION_QUESTION_4: How can I sell my mouse on your marketplace?
ACCORDION_ANSWER_4: To sell your mouse, create a seller account on our platform, provide detailed information about your product including clear photos, set your price, and list it for sale. We'll review your listing to ensure it meets our quality standards before making it visible to potential buyers.
FAQ_SUBTITLE_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: Everything you need to know about our computer mouse marketplace
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_QUESTION_TEXT_1: How does your computer mouse marketplace work?
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_1: Our marketplace connects buyers with a wide range of computer mice from various sellers. You can browse, compare, and purchase mice based on your preferences and needs.
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_QUESTION_TEXT_2: What types of computer mice do you offer?
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_2: We offer a diverse selection including wireless, wired, gaming, ergonomic, and specialty mice from top brands and independent manufacturers.
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_QUESTION_TEXT_3: How do I know which mouse is right for me?
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_3: We provide detailed product descriptions, user reviews, and comparison tools to help you find the perfect mouse. You can also use our interactive guide to match your needs with suitable options.
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_4: We offer a 30-day return policy for most items. If you're not satisfied with your purchase, you can return it for a full refund or exchange, subject to our terms and conditions.
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_5: Yes, we ship to many countries worldwide. Shipping costs and delivery times vary depending on your location. You can check shipping options during the checkout process.
